subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The San Francisco 49ers hired Mike Martz as their offensive coordinator Tuesday, landing one of the N.F.L.’s top offensive minds to fix a unit that floundered last season.
snippet: The San Francisco 49ers hired Mike Martz as their offensive coordinator Tuesday, landing one of the N.F.L.’s top offensive minds to fix a unit that floundered last season.
